001
002package com.commercetools.monitoring.newrelic;
003
004import java.util.Optional;
005
006import com.newrelic.api.agent.Token;
007import com.newrelic.api.agent.Transaction;
008
009public class NewRelicContextImpl implements AutoCloseable, NewRelicContext {
010    private final Transaction transaction;
011
012    private final Token token;
013
014    public NewRelicContextImpl(final Transaction transaction) {
015        this.transaction = transaction;
016        this.token = transaction.getToken();
017    }
018
019    public NewRelicContextImpl(final Transaction transaction, final Token token) {
020        this.transaction = transaction;
021        this.token = token;
022    }
023
024    @Override
025    public Transaction getValue() {
026        return transaction;
027    }
028
029    @Override
030    public Transaction getTransaction() {
031        return transaction;
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    public Token getToken() {
036        return token;
037    }
038
039    @Override
040    public void close() {
041        Optional.ofNullable(this.token).ifPresent(Token::expire);
042    }
043}
